objects.text: • ENERGY EFFICIENT • MULTIPLE CYCLES • QUICK DRY

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Electric Dryer | Modern Design with Smart Features
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• Multiple drying cycles including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, and Delicates
• Large capacity drum with dark glass door for easy visibility
• Digital LED display showing time remaining and cycle status
• Adjustable temperature settings for various fabric types
• Energy-efficient operation for lower utility costs
• Built-in ventilation system for optimal drying performance
• Easy-access lint filter maintenance
• Convenient control dial with blue LED accent lighting
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for modern homes
• Quick-dry technology for time-saving operation
• Wrinkle prevention feature available
• Clear maintenance instructions printed on the unit

banner_details:
This banner features a bold promotional message displayed centrally at the top using the `heading` text layer, styled in all caps with strong white typography. Just beneath it, a more elegant and italicized `subheading` text layer reinforces the advanced nature of the featured product. The centerpiece is the `product_image` layer showcasing a modern front-load dryer. To the right of the image, a large circular gradient badge contains the `price` text, prominently displaying the cost in futuristic type. Below, the `description` text highlights key features in a horizontal, bullet-separated format. Lastly, a red rectangular `cta_background` supports the `cta` text button, urging immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Gradient Background: #E0F2FF → #B0D9FF
- Accent Blue: #0B5394
- Deep Blue Gradient: #3D85C6 → #0B5394
- White (Text & Details): #FFFFFF
- Highlight Red (CTA): #FF4D4D
product_color: This product image features a modern, minimalist color palette with dominant tones of crisp white (#F8F8F8) and deep black (#181818), ideal for a clean and tech-savvy advertisement banner. The front panel leverages white as the base, symbolizing purity and innovation, while the black door adds a bold contrast, highlighting the central functional element. The digital display introduces a glowing cyan-blue (#00C8FF) for the time, enhancing visibility and adding an energetic tech vibe. Subtle use of metallic silver (#C0C0C0) in the dial ring brings sophistication. Together, these colors create a balanced blend of clarity and sleekness, perfect for conveying premium quality and modern design.
